sentences.sContent: In the nineteenth century, pirates roamed the seas.
Computer game pirates cost the industry twenty million pounds a year.
sentences.sCn: 电脑游戏盗版者每年要给该行业带来两千万英镑的损失。

synos.tran: 海盗；盗版；侵犯专利权者

words.tran: 海盗的；非法翻印的，盗版的
海盗行为；剽窃；著作权侵害；非法翻印

remMethod.val: 和private(adj. 私人的， 秘密的)一起记

trans.tranOther: someone who sails on the seas, attacking other boats and stealing things from them
